command.name: list
command.desc: Lists all items on the current list

command.name: add
command.desc: Adds item to the current list

command.name: ok
command.desc: Validates picking the item from the list

command.name: nok
command.desc: InValidates picking the item from the list

command.name: pay
command.desc: Signals that all ok items have been paid, archives a list containing all paid items, creates a new list, adds all non-ok to new list

command.name: flush
command.desc: (Hard) Removes all items from list, the items wont be archived, impossible to get them back
